bibl.title: Late Roman Social Justice and the Origin of the Defensor Civitatis.
bibl.note: The office of defensor civitatis was not created by a law of Valentinian dating to 368. An examination of legal, papyrological and literary sources suggests that the office was the product of lost legislation from the early fourth century.
bibl.seg: FRAKES R.M., Late Roman Social Justice and the Origin of the Defensor Civitatis.

The office of defensor civitatis was not created by a law of Valentinian dating to 368. An examination of legal, papyrological and literary sources suggests that the office was the product of lost legislation from the early fourth century.
